description: Government action affects us all. We pay taxes; we use public roads, schools, and parks.
Some prices we pay are lower due to government subsidies; others are higher due to taxes.
Government actions influence both the efficiency of our economy and the equity and
equality within our society.  Students learn valuable analytical tools for evaluating
public projects, tax policies, entitlement programs and voting behavior. Offered
annually. Prerequisite: ECON 262 and either ECON 263 or STAT 272, completion of BTS-T, or
